content.rendered:
Mohamed is an articulate, highly knowledgeable Internal Control & Profit Protection expert with 14+ years of auditing policies, procedures and risk management. He is a certified Internal Auditor (CIA) with a wide range of knowledge, skills and experience relating to internal controls providing sound business advice and guidance, that will allow him to contribute toward the success of our organisation.

His expertise lies in identifying risks, improving processes and reducing losses by suggesting improvements, delivering training and increasing awareness.
